name: cmm1i

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c0, c1))
-| wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccm, c0)

|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c0, c1))
-| wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wbr(cin(c0, c1), ccm, c0)

body.origin:

-| wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wss(cin(c0, c1), c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c0, c1))
-| wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wss(cin(c0, c1), c0)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cin(c0, c1), cch)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ⋂ c1)∈ CH
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c0, c1))

comment: A Hilbert lattice element commutes with its meet. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
